Subbed Projects.Show Name: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou 2 - Tamashii

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou 3 - Yakusoku

Good Comments: Accurate and faithful, quick and efficient as possible with release. Font that's easy on the eyes, leaving nothing in writing that needs to be translated untranslated, color coded subs to distinguish character dialogue is a plus.
Superb work, well translated, written text included.
